org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk

Class HddHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Host
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk.HddHost

  • public class HddHost
extends Host
    A host with one or several harddisks.
    Author:
    nikolay.grozev
